results.name: Number of ways to express 2n-1 as p+2a^2; p prime, a > 0.
comment: Similar to A046921 and A046923. Sequence A060003 lists the odd numbers having no representations.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..10000
L. Hodges, A lesser-known Goldbach conjecture, Math. Mag., 66 (1993), 45-47.
results.author: _T. D. Noe_, Aug 23 2008
